location: Songjiang Road 108 Lane, near Songjiang Nanjing MRT (102-136m)
notes: High-end hotel-style studio with premium amenities (65" Samsung TV, TOTO bidet, dishwasher, coffee machine). Being 1F eliminates stair risks for baby. However, at 13.5 ping it's quite small for a family with a baby, and no pets allowed may indicate strict management. Balcony presence requires checking railing safety. Building has good security systems and fitness facilities.
